name: cloudformation-custom-resource-provider
description: handle custom resources in your AWS Cloudformation templates

scripts.s3cp: npm run s3cpLambda && aws npm run s3cpTemplate
scripts.deploy2: TEMPLATE_URL="https://${TemplatesBucket}.s3.amazonaws.com/${TemplateUrlSubfolder}/lambda.yaml" STACK="cfn-custom-resource" AWS_PROFILE="default" PARAMETERS="--parameters ParameterKey=S3Key,ParameterValue=cfn-custom-resource/lambda.zip ParameterKey=S3Bucket,ParameterValue=contentnow-orch-lambda-functions" npm run cf_deploy
scripts.deploy: npm run s3cpTemplate && TemplatesBucket="contentnow-dev-cf-templates" TemplateUrlSubfolder="cfn-custom-resource" npm run deploy2
scripts.update-lambda: npm run zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name cfn-custom-resource-function --zip-file=fileb://./lambda.zip

author: John K. Grant <cyrfer@gmail.com>
